notes: New Boss implemented with the [[Updates/8.2|Summer Update 2008]]. Spawns with one [[Witch]]. Her name is most likely a reference to [[wikipedia:Baba Yaga|Baba Yaga]], a witch that appears in Slavic legends.[[File:Yaga.jpg|thumb]]
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-50}}|{{Ability|[[Fireball]]|30-50|element=fire}}|{{Ability|shoots [[Fire Field]]s|element=fire field}}|{{Ability|[[Envenom]]|starting at 10 [[hp]]/turn|element=poisoned}}|{{Ability|[[Invisibility]] for around 5 seconds|element=invisible}}|{{Outfit|yes|Green Frog}} }}
sounds: Where did I park my hut?
name: Yaga the Crone
behaviour: She always tries to stay away from the attacker, so she can burn you with her powerful fire missiles and poison you at a distance.
location: Four levels underground, on the way to Blood Herb Quest, {{Mapper Coords|127.200|125.11|11|3|text=here}}.
strategy: Try to push her in the corner and stand diagonally, so she won't run away and shoot more [[Fire Field]]s.
